title: NIDALEE BUG THAT HAPPENED IN MY GAME
body: I was playing Nidalee in my game with the Challenger Skin and I on occassion 5 times my spear went dead center through the champs body and didnt do any damage. Might just want to look into that please.{{champion:76}}

replies.body:
Hey Ruinlegion,

I took a look at this in comparison to her base skin, and the hit boxes are the same, so there shouldn't be a difference between using this skin or using the base.
The enemy team saw it to so i was just making sure.
